attributes.action: Keep grassroots Football going throughout Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Benefits: 
- Physical health maintained or increased during restrictions 
- Mental health maintained or increased due to social aspect of sport & looking forward to the activity each week. 
- Improves parents mental health. Taking your child & watching your child will support
attributes.background:
On 31st Oct, Boris Johnson announced national lockdown in England until 2nd Dec. All grassroots football clubs have guidelines & processes in place to make football safe. 
This petition is to fight to keep grassroots football for ADULTS & YOUTH going throughout new restrictions.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
